remarks: The trace operation and the ` filGen ` operation are inverses to one another in some sense, with ` filGen ` growing the base set and ` |``t ` shrinking it.  See ~ fgtr for the converse cancellation law. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement: trfg $p |- ( ( F e. ( Fil ` A ) /\ A C_ X /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( X filGen F ) |`t A ) = F ) $.
